broadwick.montecarlo.markovchain

Class MarkovChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.montecarlo.markovchain.MarkovChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarkovStepGenerator

    public class MarkovChain
extends Object
implements MarkovStepGenerator
    An implementation of a Markov Chain which stores the history. Markov Chains have a current step and generates a new step based solely on the current one.

    • Field Summary
